Bathroom and Beauty

A huge amount of plastic waste comes from our bathrooms - shampoo bottles, toothpaste tubes, lotions and potions. Fortunately, there's a huge variety of alternatives out there now that clean and soothe just as well as whatever you're already using.

  • Axiology Balmies

    Paper-wrapped lip, cheek and eye colours.

  • Bite

    Completely plastic-free toothbrushes, toothpaste tabs, floss and mouthwash.

  • Dental Lace

    Refillable, compostable, (optionally vegan) floss.

  • HiBar

    Salon-quality shampoo and conditioner bars.

  • Leaf Shave

    All-metal multi-blade razors

  • Loli Beauty

    Luxury organic skincare in glass jars and compostables.

  • Lolo Body Care

    Hand and body moisturising bars and soaps.

  • Lush Naked

    Bar soaps, shampoos, conditioners, moisturisers, bath bombs, facial cleansers, bubble baths and more.

  • NOAP

    Shampoo, conditioner, face and body soap bars

  • Unpaste

    Toothpaste tabs, available with fluoride.

  • Who Gives a Crap

    Toilet paper, kitchen paper towels and tissues.

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
